biography.bio: Antoine Bertrand was born in 1977 in Granby, Québec, Canada. He is an actor and producer, known for C.A. (2006), Starbuck (2011) and Les Bougon: C'est aussi ça la vie (2004).
biography.name: Antoine Bertrand

biography.bio: Guillaume Cyr is an actor, known for Louis Cyr (2013), Nos jours heureux (2006) and Score (2011).
biography.name: Guillaume Cyr

biography.bio: Rose-Maïté Erkoreka was born on July 11, 1976 in Quebec, Canada. She is an actress, known for Louis Cyr (2013), The Barbarian Invasions (2003) and Une grenade avec ça? (2002).
biography.name: Rose-Maïté Erkoreka

biography.bio: Gilbert Sicotte was born on February 18, 1948 in Montreal, Quebec, Canada. He is an actor, known for Léolo (1992), Trauma (2010) and Fortier (2001).
biography.name: Gilbert Sicotte

biography.bio: Gil Bellows was born on June 28, 1967 in Vancouver, British Columbia, Canada. He is an actor and producer, known for The Shawshank Redemption (1994), La maison au bout de la rue (2012) and Unthinkable (2010). He has been married to Rya Kihlstedt since October 3, 1994. They have two children.
biography.name: Gil Bellows

biography.bio: Cliff Saunders is an actor, known for Chicago (2002), Outlander (2008) and Spider (2002). He is married to Elizabeth Saunders. They have two children.
biography.name: Cliff Saunders

biography.bio: Amélie Grenier was born on February 22, 1973 in Gatineau, Québec, Canada. She is an actress, known for Bon Cop Bad Cop (2006), Louis Cyr (2013) and French Immersion (2011).
biography.name: Amélie Grenier

biography.bio: Normand Carrière is an actor, known for The Auction (2013), Louis Cyr (2013) and Barney's Great Adventure (1998).
biography.name: Normand Carrière

biography.bio: Charles-Olivier Pelletier is an actor, known for Louis Cyr (2013), Daybreak (2013) and Je me souviens (2009).
biography.name: Charles-Olivier Pelletier

biography.bio: Frédéric Lemay was born on September 19, 1986. He is an actor, known for Louis Cyr (2013), My Enemies (2015) and Hivernam (2002).
biography.name: Frédéric Lemay

biography.bio: Naomi La is an actress, known for Louis Cyr (2013), The 3 L'il Pigs 2 (2016) and Agent Secret (2015).
biography.name: Naomi La

biography.bio: Léa Thouin is an actress, known for Louis Cyr (2013), Heat Wave (2009) and Chloé (2012).
biography.name: Léa Thouin

biography.bio: Eliane Gagnon is an established trilingual actress born in Montreal with a French Canadian and Chilean roots. Eliane holds a certificate in film writing from the University of Québec in Montréal. She has been in the TV and film industry over the past 12 years. She mostly is a self-taught actor and filmmaker. In May 2014 she applied at the Canadian Film Center Actor's Conservatory, where she was accepted among 9 actors from across Canada. She got awarded a significant grant from The Brian Linehan Foundation for her 6 month residency in the acting program. She's now driven to work in the Canadian and American market. Throughout her acting career, Eliane has mainly played dramatic roles but she recently had a taste of comedy in Chloé Robichaud's successful web series Feminin/Feminin. She is also the interpreter of Emiliana Cyr in Quebec's box office success Louis Cyr: The strongest man in the world. Currently, she has a recurring role in the 3rd season of the TV show Mémoires Vives which will be aired on Radio-Canada in September 2015. Eliane has always had the need and passion for writing. She enrolled in the scriptwriting program of Université du Québec à Montréal (UQAM) in 2009. In 2013, she wrote and produced a short film entitled Douce Amère (Bittersweet) that has screened at many festivals around the world. The film won Best International Short Film award at the International Film Festival of Williamsburg in New York City. Her challenging experience on Bittersweet production made her realize the importance of having full artistic control of her own work. After 12 years working as an actress and 6 years as a writer, Gagnon finally feels ready to make, from A to Z, her first short film: LOST ONES. Her experience only strengthened her desire to make more films and she is now focused on gaining experience as a director. LOST ONES also gave her the opportunity to start up her own production company, Galop Films, created with her artistic partner actress-writer Valérie Gervais Lillo. Currently, as a writer, she is developing two bilingual feature films: How Could I be loved (English/French) and she is co-writing La Gloria (French/Spanish) with the same production partner.
biography.name: Eliane Gagnon

biography.bio: Marilyn Castonguay is an actress, known for L'affaire Dumont (2012), Miraculum (2014) and L'ange gardien (2014).
biography.name: Marilyn Castonguay

biography.bio: Elias Toufexis has become an actor with a fan base and cult following around the world. He has played dozens of major characters on television in shows like. Bitten, Lost Girl, Alphas, Stargate Atlantis, Smallville, Eureka, Houdini & Doyle and particularly memorable characters on Supernatural and The Expanse Elias has amassed quite a following in the Science Fiction/Fantasy community. But television and film is only half of what Elias is known for. In the video-game world, Elias has played the leading characters in many multi-million dollar projects. The Assassin's Creed Series, The Far Cry Series, The Deus Ex Series, The Splinter Cell Series and dozens more... He does not only voice these characters but completely performs them through Motion/Performance Capture. Playing the leading character of Adam Jensen in The Deus Ex series has brought Elias the most fame. The original sold 4 Million+ units (making more than 280 Million) and now it has spawned sequels and an entire entertainment universe, from multiple games to books to comics, bringing Elias even more attention. He is also the lead character of Takkar in the game Far Cry Primal. Another leading character in an immensely popular franchise. The 6th title of this multi-million dollar series. You can also hear Elias as the voice of Yellow Pages, McDonald's, Lexus Cars and many many more radio and TV voice-over commercials.
biography.name: Elias Toufexis
